description:
An alien virus jumps from Mois`s laptop to the underground base`s mainframe and then really wreaks havoc! Then a sentient antique clock from space arrives for Keroro. To help the kindly clock regain its memories, Kululu participates in a tense black market auction.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mois, Genius Hacker? / Kururu, Small Old Clock
モア 天才ハッカー? であります / クルル 小さな古時計 であります
